Title: Song of the Sea
Writer: Will Collins (screenplay by), Tomm Moore (based on an original story by)
Actors: David Rawle, Brendan Gleeson, Lisa Hannigan, Fionnula Flanagan
Plot: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the fairies and save the spirit world.
Country: Ireland, Denmark, Belgium, Luxembourg, France, Japan, USA, UK
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 11 wins & 25 nominations.
